title: Our Services
subtitle: We offer a variety of services to help you build and maintain your digital presence.

services.title: Essential Web Maintenance €25/month
services.description: Ensures the proper functioning and online availability of your website.

services.title: Online Reputation Management €25/month
services.description: Active and professional management of online reviews and ratings to build a positive brand image and foster customer trust.

services.title: Support & Content Hour Pack €25/hour
services.description: The flexible solution to keep your website alive. Ideal for content updates, minor design tweaks, or technical consultations. Purchase a pack of hours and use them as you need them.

services.title: Web Visibility Report €25/month
services.description: Understand your website's performance without the complexity. Receive a monthly PDF report that tells you how many people visit you, how they find you, and what they're interested in.

services.title: Monthly Authority Plan €75/month
services.description: A monthly service to keep your website active with SEO-optimized blog articles, without you having to spend time on writing.

services.title: Optional Add-ons
services.description: Enhance your website with specific features. Choose from contact form management, booking calendars, social media feeds, and more.

services.title: Service Packs
services.description: Save money with our integrated solutions. Combine services and get the maximum value for your project.

services.title: E-commerce Solutions
services.description: Complete online stores so you can sell your products and services 24/7. Integrated with secure payment gateways.

services.title: CMS Integration
services.description: We connect your site to a Content Management System (CMS) so you can edit your website's content yourself, easily and without code.

offer.title: Special Offer: Website Creation or Migration with a 90% Discount
offer.description: By contracting the "Essential Web Maintenance" service for a minimum period of 12 months, the client can benefit from a 90% discount on the creation or migration of their website.
conditions: The service must be contracted for a minimum period of 12 months.
The discount applies only to the creation or migration of the website.
